ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would highly recommend this course because it is well run and very interesting.

I would say that MCDB 670 conveys the wonderful world of RNA function in the most vivid and enjoyable way possible. It is a rare opportunity to discuss important work at great length with leaders in the field. I would recommend this course emphatically and without reservation.
This course provides insights into the major discoveries in the RNA world, with help in understanding how to read papers critically and how to evaluate data as well as learning new methodologies.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It taught me how to better read scientific publication and analyze and think critically of their flaws and strengths. This is a very important skill throughout my graduate career.
